snippet: A look at the latest developments as the state awaits new Congressional and legislative district lines based on the 2010 census.
abstract: Update of New York State’s attempts to redraw its political maps to reflect the 2010 census; legislative conferences fail to agree on latest proposed map of Congressional districts and State NAACP president Hazel N Dukes calls on Gov Andrew M Cuomo to honor an earlier promise to veto any maps produced by the Legislature’s redistricting task force.
lead_paragraph: A look at the latest developments as the state awaits new Congressional and legislative district lines based on the 2010 census.

headline.seo: Unmapped — Update on New York Redistricting
